item.title: Five things I learnt from: A History of the World
item.description: I will admit; I was one of those who resented studying history, I found it to be in contempt of my time.

item.title: Five things I learnt from: 2020
item.description: I vividly remember writing this piece up, in the same place, with same keystrokes and having same enthusiasm last year, so much so, that in my gut, I feel my past and present have somehow interlaced, conspiring against my sanity â€“ experiencing both moments at once.

item.title: Five things I learnt from: THE GENE
item.description: The world has never seen a quarantine like this, it is a great time to get a crash course in genetics.

item.title: Five things I learnt from: 2019
item.description: I have written a couple of blogs on my site by now - I pick a book, try to comprehend it and share with you all of what I loved the most about it, business as usual.
